mapper.select: select rpid, mid, url, oid, ctime, root, parent, location, message, like_num, up_action, stat, typ, catch_time, reply_num from t_bili_reply where rpid = #{rpid}
mapper.insert: insert into t_bili_reply (rpid, mid, url, oid, ctime, root, parent, location, message, like_num, up_action, stat, typ, catch_time, reply_num) values (#{rpid}, #{mid}, #{url}, #{oid}, #{ctime}, #{root}, #{parent}, #{location}, #{message}, #{like}, #{upAction}, #{stat}, #{type}, #{catchTime}, #{replyNum})

insert into t_bili_reply(rpid, mid, url, oid, ctime, root, parent, location, message, like_num, up_action, stat, typ, catch_time, reply_num) values
(#{entity.rpid}, #{entity.mid}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.oid}, #{entity.ctime}, #{entity.root}, #{entity.parent}, #{entity.location}, #{entity.message}, #{entity.like}, #{entity.upAction}, #{entity.stat}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.catchTime}, #{replyNum})
mapper.update:
update t_bili_reply
mid = #{mid},
url = #{url},
oid = #{oid},
ctime = #{ctime},
root = #{root},
parent = #{parent},
location = #{location},
message = #{message},
like_num = #{like},
up_action = #{upAction},
stat = #{stat},
typ = #{type},
catch_time = #{catchTime},
reply_num = #{replyNum},
where rpid = #{rpid}
